displayName.text: Hilltop NYC Bicycles - Lower East Side

formattedAddress: 128 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 128 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: The best. My new go-to shop for all cycling needs. Gio, the manager, is extremely knowledgeable and patient! He will take the time to answer all questions. The entire team is top notch. I no longer have to worry about where to get my bikes serviced. Here, at Hilltop!

text.text: The best. My new go-to shop for all cycling needs. Gio, the manager, is extremely knowledgeable and patient! He will take the time to answer all questions. The entire team is top notch. I no longer have to worry about where to get my bikes serviced. Here, at Hilltop!

originalText.text:
Fast service, friendly staff, reasonable prices. Can’t really ask for much else! I brought in my bike that’s been sitting in the rain for a few months and was really rusty with broken brakes and covered in dirt. They gave it back to me in two days, with what I can only describe as effectively a brand new bicycle. They even cleaned it, and I audibly gasped at how smooth it felt when I took my first pedal.

Would highly recommend!

text.text:

originalText.text: Good people who are kind and knowledgeable mechanics and a diverse lot of riders work at this bike shop. I recommend popping in, nothing too small or big; you will be welcomed here. There's also plenty of pretty bikes and gear to marvel at.

text.text: Good people who are kind and knowledgeable mechanics and a diverse lot of riders work at this bike shop. I recommend popping in, nothing too small or big; you will be welcomed here. There's also plenty of pretty bikes and gear to marvel at.

originalText.text:
Update:

Two years and a half later I came back to Hilltop Lower East Side for my bike upgrade. This time I purchased a Tarmac SL7 Expert and the staff went above and beyond. Hats off to the entire team but especially to Gio. He helped so so much to make sure that my bike had components that my bike fit required. He swapped components from another bike to mine and gave me the best absolute price I could have gotten on this beauty. I'm more than satisfied and happy with my experience with Hilltop. I actually moved out from NY to VA and even with that, I decided to buy my new bike with them. That itself tells a lot of how good and professional the staff is. Thank you, Gio, thank you, Hilltop.

Just got my 2021 Specialized Allez from this place. The staff is absolutely amazing. As a matter of fact, I had already made a deal with another bike shop for the same bike. However, the costumer experience at this place was a game changer. They took their time to take whole bunch of measurements to make sure I was getting the right size without even knowing that I was gonna buy it. I ended up spending 2+ hours in the store talking to the guys in there and just exchanging experiences. If you want a Specialized bike, please come here and save yourself some time an extra hassle. They are Specialized authorized retailer and super cool.

originalText.text:
I have been a proud owner of a Pinarello Paris for two years now, and my recent experience at Hilltop Bicycles in the Lower East Side has been nothing short of extraordinary. This shop is a true haven for road cyclists, and I can’t recommend it enough!

As a specialized bike store, Hilltop Cycles offers a wide range of top-of-the-line S-Works models that are simply stunning. When I stepped into the shop, I was in awe of their impressive selection of high-quality bikes and accessories. The staff’s expertise in all things cycling is remarkable, and they are genuinely passionate about helping riders like me find the perfect fit for our needs.

What really sets Hilltop Bicycles apart is their dedication to ensuring every customer has the best possible experience. When I brought my Pinarello Paris for a tune-up and maintenance, they treated it with utmost care and attention to detail. Not only did they fine-tune my bike to perfection, but they also recommended some upgrades that have significantly enhanced my riding performance.

For road cyclists in Lower Manhattan, Hilltop Bicycles is a true paradise. Whether you’re a seasoned rider or a beginner, the staff is eager to assist, offering valuable advice and personalized service. Their knowledge and expertise shine through in every interaction, making it evident that they genuinely care about their customers and their cycling journey.

Beyond their impressive selection of bikes, Hilltop Bicycles also stocks an extensive range of accessories, making it a one-stop-shop for all your cycling needs. The shop’s atmosphere exudes warmth and camaraderie, creating a welcoming environment that’s perfect for any cyclist looking to enhance their riding experience.

In conclusion, Hilltop Bicycles is an absolute gem in the Lower East Side. With their specialization in Specialized bikes and the exquisite S-Works line, road cyclists can find their dream rides here. The attentive staff, exceptional service, and dedication to customer satisfaction make it a true bike heaven for anyone seeking top-notch cycling solutions in Lower Manhattan.

If you’re a road cyclist looking for a place that shares your passion and can elevate your riding experience to new heights, look no further than Hilltop Bicycles. I’m a proud customer and will continue to be a loyal patron for years to come!

Note: As you requested, I have refrained from using hashtags in the review.
